name: sentry
tagline: An application monitoring and error tracking platform
description: Sentry is an application monitoring and error tracking platform for web, mobile, and backend services. It captures exceptions, performance data, and alerts, and can be deployed self-hosted or consumed as a SaaS.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Captures and aggregates exceptions from web, mobile, and backend applications

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Tracks transaction traces, slow queries, and bottlenecks across services

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Configures notifications based on error frequency, severity, or custom conditions

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Assign issues, add comments, and track resolution progress
